rows.label: qst700503_msg0001
rows.name:
Aaand, I think that about does it!
It just needs a few last finishing
touches and we're golden.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0002
rows.name:
This is all very exciting, isn't it?
Though in all honesty, it will be
sad to see it go...

rows.label: qst700503_msg0003
rows.name:
Creating items of value for others is
part of the charm of being an artisan.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0004
rows.name:
And it's especially rewarding to make
something for someone you care about.
I do hope it will be appreciated.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0005
rows.name:
Hey, can I ask you something?
How do you even go about making
something like this?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0006
rows.name: Oh? Someone on your mind, Hikari?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0007
rows.name: Are you thinking about Adel?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0008
rows.name:
Adel?! What? No! I, I just thought...
it'd be nice to have one of my own,
that's all...

rows.label: qst700503_msg0009
rows.name:
Speaking generally, I think it's hard to
be able to really express your feelings
to someone.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0010
rows.name:
Sometimes something as simple
as giving them a present can be
the answer.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0011
rows.name:
...But what if you manage to screw
it all up? How do you cope with that
kind of embarrassment?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0012
rows.name:
Embarrassment? What matters is
that you put in the time and effort
to make it. They'll appreciate that.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0013
rows.name: You think...?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0014
rows.name:
Sure they will. Listen, I know how
to make a few basic accessories.
Want me to teach you sometime?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0015
rows.name:
Oh, that sounds nice. I hope you
wouldn't mind my watching.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0016
rows.name: I'd love to watch too, if that's all right!

rows.label: qst700503_msg0017
rows.name:
You know, I think I may just
participate as well.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0018
rows.name: Mmm... Yeah, go on then.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0019
rows.name:
Great! Looks like we can get a group
activity going!

rows.label: qst700503_msg0020
rows.name:
They look like they're having fun.
...Oh?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0021
rows.name:
Since when did Wadatsumi get
pally with the girls?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0022
rows.name:
Good on you, Wadatsumi.
Lucky devil.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0023
rows.name: I wish I knew his secret...

rows.label: qst700503_msg0024
rows.name:
Poor Hugo. Don't worry, though.
Your time will come.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0025
rows.name:
Going through that stage, are
we, Your Majesty?

rows.label: qst700503_msg0026
rows.name:
W-what stage? Shin please say
something!

rows.label: qst700503_msg0027
rows.name: Me? Well, I...

rows.label: qst700503_msg0028
rows.name:
Sorry Hugo. Looks like Shin's
with us on this one.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0029
rows.name: I didn't even say anything...

rows.label: qst700503_msg0030
rows.name:
Adel? I'll have you know I consider
this a form of persecution.

rows.label: qst700503_msg0031
rows.name:
Ahaha! Inciting your wrath
is the last thing I'd want to do!
